name: Noctowl
author: Suwama Chiaki
flavor_text: Its eyes are specially adapted. They concentrate even faint light and enable it to see in the dark.

poke_power.name: Night Sight
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw a card. This power can’t be used if Noctowl is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Extrasensory
attacks.effect: If you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, this attack does 40 damage plus 40 more damage.
